text:
Mohsen Avid (born september 8, 1993 in Tehran) is an Iranian Rapper, singer.
Professional life.
Mohsen Avid started working with the cloud and wind art group in 2007, whose style was street rap and street rap. He released one album and twenty singles. In 2010, he sent the music of life and rap to the pmc global network in collaboration with Power and LP, and after confirming this, it was broadcast on this network. In 2014, with music censorship and its worldwide distribution, it was able to open a new position in rap audiences.
Music.
Enough crying, Gang life, Gang party, Insensitive, Rap life, Release
